Earrings size: 1.1in*0.5in. We create classic jewelry for the modern American woman. Tailored with an eye for trend-right color, we offer traditional metal styling in polished or textured finishes.
Our lightweight earrings for women, are designed to complement head-to-toe dressing with sophisticated silhouettes that can allow you to go from desk to dinner in style.
Ganga Jewells brand appeals to the modern woman with collections that are clean & polished, carrying on our heritage with designs that convey the look & feel of luxury.
Available in different colors: Blue, Purple, Black, Turquoise, Light Blue, Dark Blue, White Pearl, Cocoa Pearl, Aqua Blue
body.description: These handmade Swarovski Crystal Lever-back earrings are made from pure stainless steel and skin friendly material. The beautiful earrings is a perfect gift for your loved ones valentine's day, anniversary, wedding or some special day ♥♥♥♥♥ Ganga Jewells♥♥♥♥♥ ♥ Ganga Jewells is a famous Jewelry brand in India. We provide best service include 24 hours response, 100% satisfied sold out service. ♥ We promise that we use Factual description, Real photo, Genuine 925 Sterling Silver and if less than 92.5% silver, we will 3 times money pay back! ♥ Please take care about the jewelry size when you purchase. Usually the sterling jewelry is smaller than the brass or alloy jewelry. Polishing cloths are an excellent choice for cleaning your sterling silver jewelry if oxidized and black. ♥ 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED? ♥ 90 days free risk money back to protect you when you receive any defected order, welcome any test of our jewelry. ♥Caring for Your Sterling Silver Jewelry ♥ Silver should not come into contact with harsh household chemicals such as bleach, ammonia, or chlorine. ♥ To avoid scratches, store silver in a lined jewelry box or pouch, as it is prone to tarnish as it naturally reacts with sulfur or hydrogen sulfide in the air. ♥ Cleaning and wearing silver jewelry regularly will prevent this and help maintain its shine. Immediately upon noticing any discoloration, use a gentle polish made specifically for removing tarnish.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very nice earrings, they remind me of the ones I have previously bought from Napier which is one of my favorite brands because their pieces have lasted me for years. These are so similar that I actually thought I was buying Napier, but nevertheless they are excellent! Very cute and good quality. Will probably buy more of these, and the price was absolutely a great deal!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my mother whose birthday is in February. They are very light weight and easy to wear. The clasps close very firmly and are comfortable enough for her to sleep in them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice product .
reviews.reviewText: I like the fact that they are sparkly.very nice product .greatprice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The earrings arrived on time which was convenient because I bought them as a gift for a coworker. She really liked them and although I’ve not seen her wearing them yet, she assured me she will and that they are very nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beauty and comfort!
reviews.reviewText: These earrings are wonderful, especially for the price. They are a perfect size, big enough to "speak" and show detail, small enough to avoid catching in clothes. No irritation to ears, lightweight and comfortable putting on hinge backs. The blue crystal sparkles and complements clothes very nicely. Planning on ordering one or two other colors in this style. Recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Lovely but very poor quality
reviews.reviewText: Received the earrings and really liked how they looked when I shook them out of the bag. When I later went to put them on, the first one went on with no problem & looked great. Unfortunately, the clasp of the 2nd one broke in my hand when I opened it. VERY disappointing! They came in a tiny (about 1 1/2"x3") clear plastic bag which I had already thrown away. I dug through the trash but couldn't find the tiny bag with the label on it, so I can't return them.Update: Seller has reached out to me and offered a full refund. Added 2 stars for good customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought as an everyday earring. Love them, especially the lever back style. Will probably get in other colors. Very lightweight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just ordered my 3rd pair!
reviews.reviewText: These earrings are very high quality and very nice looking. The lever backs are comfortable and the earrings are the perfect size. I really like everything about them. I just may order a 4th pair!!
Estan muy lindos, es un excelente articulo para usar o regalar.
Love these earrings. They are more of a deep aquamarine color which I love. Not too heavy and they go with many outfits. Highly recommend.
Broke after a week. And now there aren't any left for a replacement with the black stones. It was a Christmas gift for my mother. What a mediocre experience.
